meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Robert Weibezahl Jon Beebe Stephanie Garrone-Shufran Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7495.

td.p: Robert Weibezahl, a writer from Westlake Village, California
Jon Beebe, a software developer from New York, New York
Stephanie Garrone-Shufran, a teacher educator from Woburn, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,400)

tr.td: ART & THE BIBLE
STATE
OH, THE HORROR!
THE "LONG" & THE "SHORT" OF IT
GREETINGS
WHAT'S IN YOUR POCKET?

banishment (or being expelled from the garden)

Stephanie
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
